question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Referendum/ReferendumContract_ACS1_TransactionFeeProvider.cs] [Function: SetMethodFee()] [Authorization Bypass] Can an attacker call SetMethodFee before RequiredMethodFeeControllerSet initializes State.MethodFeeController.Value, bypassing the sender check at line 15 since it would compare against null?
